options.name: value
options.label: Text Value to Split
options.info: The text value to split into an array.

options.name: trim
options.label: Trim
options.info: If true, trims the whitespace from the beginning and end of each element in the array.

options.name: removeEmpty
options.label: Remove Empty
options.info: If true, removes empty elements from the array.

options.name: delimiter
options.label: Delimiter
options.info: The delimiter to split the text value by. Default is a comma.

options.name: logging
options.label: Logging
options.info: If true, logs the result to the console.
